FuncDef:
The remote-address command configures a remote IP address.
The undo remote-address command deletes the remote IP address.
By default, no remote address is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the remotely assigned IP address.
It is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Use the remote-address command, you can specify a remote IP address.Only VPLS PW ping test instances are supported.
